Domain

Class Paddle

  • java.lang.Object
    • Domain.Paddle

  • public class Paddle
extends java.lang.Object
    OVERVIEW: The one and only Paddle object of the Bricking Bad Game, holds the data for creating Paddle and implementing its functions.
    Author:
    Team Monopoly

              int width,

              int[] xPositions,
              int[] yPositions,
              int xposition,
              int yposition,
              int rotationAngle)
        MODIFIES: This class. EFFECTS: Construct an instance of this class.
        Parameters:
        velocity - - velocity of Paddle
        length - - length of Paddle
        width - - width of Paddle
        direction - - direction of Paddle
        xPositions - - x positions of Paddle
        yPositions - - y positions of Paddle
        xposition - - x position of Paddle
        yposition - - y position of Paddle
        rotationAngle - - rotation angle of Paddle

      • rotate

        public void rotate(int angleSelection)
        REQUIREMENTS: angleSelection=1 || angleSelection=-1 MODIFIES: angleSelection property of this class EFFECTS: angle of the paddle changed due to input angleSelection.
        Parameters:
        angleSelection -

      • move

        public void move(int dir,
                 int speed)
        REQUIREMENTS: dir && speed != 0 MODIFIES: xPositions and yPositions of this class with respect to inputs. EFFECTS: moves paddle to given direction with the given speed.
        Parameters:
        dir -
        speed -
